books.title: Les Misérables
books.author: Victor Hugo
books.description: Les Misérables is a French historical novel by Victor Hugo, first published in 1862, that is considered one of the greatest novels of the 19th century.

books.title: The Lord of the Rings
books.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
books.description: This epic fantasy set in Middle-earth tells the adventures that change the fate of the ring.

books.title: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
books.author: J.K. Rowling
books.description: Set in a magical world, this book tells the beginning of Harry Potter's adventures.

books.author: George Orwell
books.description: Set in a totalitarian world, this novel explores themes of individual freedom and societal control.

books.title: The Brothers Karamazov
books.author: Fyodor Dostoyevsky
books.description: Centered around moral conflicts and themes of crime, this novel is one of Dostoyevsky's masterpieces.

books.title: War and Peace
books.author: Leo Tolstoy
books.description: Set during Napoleon's invasion of Russia, this novel is famous for its historical and psychological depth.

books.title: Dune
books.author: Frank Herbert
books.description: Set on the desert planet Arrakis, this science fiction novel explores themes of politics and religion.

books.title: Silence
books.author: Shusaku Endo
books.description: Set in 17th-century Japan, it tells the story of a priest and themes of faith.

books.title: The Catcher in the Rye
books.author: J.D. Salinger
books.description: The story of young Holden Caulfield, this novel critiques youth and society.

books.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
books.author: Harper Lee
books.description: Dealing with racial discrimination, this novel tells a childhood story in Alabama.

books.title: The Stranger
books.author: Albert Camus
books.description: Exploring existentialist thought, this novel tells the story of an assassin.

books.title: Perfume: The Story of a Murderer
books.author: Patrick Süskind
books.description: Set in 18th-century France, this novel tells the story of a perfumer.

books.title: Wuthering Heights
books.author: Emily Brontë
books.description: Exploring themes of love, passion, and revenge, this novel is set in Yorkshire.

books.title: The Sea of Cortez
books.author: John Steinbeck
books.description: Set in 1930s California, this novel portrays the lives of fishermen.

books.title: Crime and Punishment
books.author: Fyodor Dostoyevsky
books.description: This novel, one of the literary masterpieces, tells the story of a young student named Raskolnikov who deals with crime and conscience.

books.title: Fi
books.author: Azra Kohen
books.description: The journey of experiencing without getting lost in the experience.

books.title: Ci
books.author: Azra Kohen
books.description: The journey of experiencing without getting lost in the experience.

books.title: Pi
books.author: Azra Kohen
books.description: The journey of experiencing without getting lost in the experience.

books.title: Atomic Habits
books.author: James Clear
books.description: Small changes, big results.

books.title: The Miracle Morning
books.author: Hal Elrod
books.description: Guaranteed to Change Your Life Before 8 AM in 6 Minutes.
